title: Badlands National Park: News
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News             News       News Releases The National Park Service makes every effort to keep you informed about breaking news events, special events, and new or ongoing projects. News releases for Badlands National Park will be posted and archived here, so check back often to keep current about the latest happenings at the park. News Releases  Â    Other Ways to Stay Connected Facebook "Like" Badlands National Park on Facebook to see beautiful photography, videos, and regular updates on what's going on in Badlands. Twitter Follow @BadlandsNPS, the official Twitter feed of Badlands National Park, for news about what's going on in the park. Photographs and Video Do you need photos or short video for a news story or school project?  Badlands maintains an extensive photo collection on Flickr.  All images are public domain and free to use; most are high-resolution.  Please credit the appropriate photographer and NPS.  For video, some short clips and slideshows are available on Flickr.  The park also has a YouTube channel.
